name: EditorMusic
description: music in your editor, what's not to like?

skip-song.name: Show next song button in editor

prev-song.name: Show previous song button in editor

unnamed-song-fallback.name: Use filename for unnamed songs (req. restart)
unnamed-song-fallback.description: If this is enabled, it uses the file name for unnamed songs instead of your preference.

extra-songs-path.name: Extra songs path (req. restart)
extra-songs-path.description: If this is set to a path, EditorMusic will take songs from here as well as the config folder.
